Package ahrsemulator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AHRSEmulator
    This application emulates the response of four Microstrain AHRS models: 1.
    AHRSOutput
    Processes data received from the serial port - if the value corresponds to a Euler angle data request,
    AHRSSelect
    Loads the mouse listeners into each AHRS panel.
    BuildFrame
    Builds the JFrame and corresponding JPanel (which has all of the other JPanels and other objects loaded - including the GUI).
    BuildImageJPanel
    Loads the AHRS image into a JPanel for display.
    BuildJPanel
    This is for the construction of a JPanel.
    BuildMainPanel
    Builds the main JPanel - that gets loaded into the JFrame - and all components that are associated with the main JPanel (sub JPanels, mouse listeners, etc.).
    ConnectSerialPort
    Initializes the serial communications and launches two threads â€“ AttCom and AttRecv.
    DataObject
    This class provides a means to exchange data between different classes.
    EmulatorMain
    Creates the HashMap which maps the model number (0 through 3) to the AHRS model name (a String - e.g.
    GUIControl
    Loads the GUI objects and implements the listeners.
    ThreadQueue
    This is the thread-safe communications link between AHRSSelect and AHRSOutput.
